module3.question: Which row of the table correctly identifies the process and reason for gene pool changes?
options: Gene flow - Change in frequency of the b allele due to a mutation
Genetic drift - Change in frequency of the b allele due to random events
Gene flow - Introduction of more b alleles due to new members moving into the population
Genetic drift - Introduction of more b alleles due to this allele being more advantageous
module3.answer: Genetic drift - Change in frequency of the b allele due to random events
module3.explanation: Genetic drift involves changes in allele frequency due to random events rather than selective pressure.
